title: Data mining and spatio-temporal characteristics of urban road ...
summary: This article focuses on data mining and spatio-temporal characteristics of urban road emissions, utilizing Didi data and survey data. It explores the spatio-temporal distribution of emissions based on these contextual datasets.
usefulness_reason: Score 65 assigned because the article discusses "spatio-temporal characteristics" and explicitly mentions the use of "survey data" as a contextual dataset.
